long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you looking for a place to buy or rent and struggling to keep track of your favourite listings from different real estate sites?

Introducing HomeSave, the ultimate real estate listing organiser! 

With HomeSave, you can easily save and manage property listings from multiple websites in one convenient location. Whether you're searching for your dream home or the perfect rental property, HomeSave has you covered.

Key Features:

+ Save listings from popular real estate websites around the world
    - US: Zillow.com, Realtor.com, Trulia.com
    - Italy: Idealista.it and more! (see screenshots for full list)
    - France: seloger.com
    - Let us know which other sites we should support!

+ Organise your saved listings into a single collection that can be sorted by location, price, and size.

+ Compatible with both rental and sale listings for a seamless property search experience.

+ Completely free and private! All your data is safely stored on your computer.


Say goodbye to the hassle of juggling multiple real estate websites and browser bookmarks. Don't miss out on your dream home - try HomeSave today and revolutionize your real estate journey!
